name: sparky
title: Sparky
description: Sparky is a live data binding DOM templating engine that enhances HTML with declarative tags and composeable templates, and batches rendering changes to the browser frame rate.

scripts.build: npm run build-iife && npm run build-min
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/sparky.js dist/sparky-2.3.3.js && cp dist/sparky.min.js dist/sparky-2.3.3.min.js && cp dist/sparky.css dist/sparky-2.3.3.css
